Home → Events and activities

Events and activities

Children

Songs, stories & crafts for toddlers, pre–school & primary age.

Older people

Coffee groups, history, arts & crafts for older people and their carers.

Reading groups

Join a library group and find out about setting up your own.

Free computer courses

Free courses for complete computer and internet beginners.

Screenings

Presents, top quality screenings of theatre, ballet and exhibitions across our libraries.

Building Wellness through Reading

One day conference for education professionals to help promote reading as a therapeutic activity.

Bookfest

Our annual book festival will take place in October 2016.

What's on

A list of all special events taking place in Suffolk's libraries.

A nib heading

Free access to Ancestry, Find My Past, Access to Research and many other resources.
